posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 29', 'OR Text', '29', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 685 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Our doors are open for self-guided, in-person, and virtual tours!', 'As we value your safety, our community has implemented practices due to COVID-19.', 'To continue protecting the safety of our customers and our team, masks are required!', 'Features:', 'Luxury 1, 2 and 3 Bedroom Apartment Homes, Premium Finishes', 'Community Amenities:', 'Fitness Studio, Clothes Care Center, New Pool Lounge Area, Leash Free Dog Park, Package Receiving, Outdoor Kitchen, Tennis Court, Two Sparkling Pools, New Convenient Online Services, Online Maintenance Requests, Enhanced Landscaping, Cyber Cafe, Lounge Seating Area, Play Park', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Policy Type: Cat, Dog', 'Max Weight of Pets: 50', 'Max Number of Pets: 2', 'Pet Policy: We welcome up to 2 pets per apartment home.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Weight limit is 50lbs.', 'We accept cats and dogs.', 'Please call our leasing office for complete pet policy.', 'Income Requirements:', 'Combined gross income for all applicants much equal or exceed three times the rental rate.', 'Follow This Link for More Information:', '<URL>', '7CS7st9kZsL']
